name: VR GoogleCardboard Gaze Only (and older cheap headsets)
name_original: VR GoogleCardboard Gaze Only (and older cheap headsets)
description:
ZOSU VR GoogleCardboard / Old cheap headsets - Gaze Control Virtual Reality

- other free VR and html games https://zosustudios.itch.io/

 CONTROLS

- Works on old cheap headsets and GoogleCardboard, Gaze Controls Only (old headsets you slide Android phone into)

- No buttons or controller needed, 100% Gaze.  

- Move where you look, looking up slightly will cause you to stop and swing an are to chop down trees

- 100% custom graphics and models (except a couple UI elements and water)

GAME CONTENT

- Multiple levels including ability to walk around small planets or into huge levels totalling 3+ square miles, also small towns to explore. Also if you look up about 30 degrees you will stop and swing an are to cut down trees.

MISC

- I never published this because I moved onto other types of games and couldn't get the googlecardboard api/sdk to stop pingung the internet when levels changed,,however, this build from 2019 still works on even my new Android Phone and old $10 random thrift storeheadset that has no controller or buttons and GoogleCardboard still detects it

- if it is popular at all on itch I'll rebuild it and publish to AndroidPlaystore

- other free VR and html games https://zosustudios.itch.io/
